AutomaticallyInstallMacOSUpdates.title: Automatically Install MacOS Updates
AutomaticallyInstallMacOSUpdates.description: If false, restricts the "Install macOS Updates" option and prevents the user from changing the option.

AllowPreReleaseInstallation.title: Allow PreRelease Installation
AllowPreReleaseInstallation.description: If true, prerelease software can be installed on this computer.

AutomaticallyInstallAppUpdates.title: Automatically Install App Updates
AutomaticallyInstallAppUpdates.description: If false, deselects the "Install app updates from the App Store" option and prevents the user from changing the option.

AutomaticCheckEnabled.title: Automatic Check Enabled
AutomaticCheckEnabled.description: If false, deselects the "Check for updates" option and prevents the user from changing the option.

ConfigDataInstall.title: Config Data Install
ConfigDataInstall.description: If false, restricts the automatic installation of configuration data.

AutomaticDownload.title: Automatic Download
AutomaticDownload.description: If false, deselects the "Download new updates when available from the App Store" option and prevents the user from changing the option.

restrict-software-update-require-admin-t.title: restrict-software-update-require-admin-to-install
restrict-software-update-require-admin-t.description: If true, restrict app installations to admin users. This key has the same function as the restrict-store-require-admin-to-install key in the com.apple.appstore payload.

CriticalUpdateInstall.title: Critical Update Install
CriticalUpdateInstall.description: If false, disables the automatic installation of critical updates and prevents the user from changing the "Install system data files and security updates" option.
